original_text: As you know, it was because of an illness that I first preached the gospel to you,
korean_text: 내가 처음에 육체의 약함으로 말미암아 너희에게 복음을 전한 것을 너희가 아는 바라

sentences.original_text: it was because of an illness
that I first preached the gospel to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 처음으로 너희에게 복음을 전파했던 것이다
